notes: Third generation minivan final year (1996-2000). Chrysler NS platform. Replaced by Chrysler Voyager. Data sourced from Wikipedia Plymouth Voyager article, January 2025 revision.
Extended wheelbase Voyager final year (1996-2000). Chrysler NS platform. Discontinued with Plymouth brand phaseout. Data sourced from Wikipedia Plymouth Voyager article, January 2025 revision.
Second generation compact (2000-2001 as Plymouth). Chrysler PL platform. Continued as Dodge Neon after 2001. Data sourced from Wikipedia Plymouth Neon article, January 2025 revision.

Retro hot rod roadster (1997-2002). Final Plymouth model. Continued as Chrysler Prowler 2002. Aluminum space frame, limited production. Data sourced from Wikipedia Plymouth Prowler article, January 2025 revision.
Compact sedan final year (1996-2000). Chrysler JA platform. Discontinued with Plymouth phaseout. Data sourced from Wikipedia Plymouth Breeze article, January 2025 revision.
